channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NYT ‘Connections’ Hints For Wednesday, August 27: Today’s Clues And Answers
item.description: Looking for some help with today's NYT Connections? Some hints and the answers for today's game are right here to help keep your streak alive.

item.title: Samsung, Fitbit And Huawei Soundly Beaten By New Apple Watch
item.description: Do not buy a watch until you read this.

item.title: Casio Goes Mechanical With Edifice EFK-100 In A Smartwatch-Obsessed World
item.description: Casio Edifice EFK-100 brings mechanical watchmaking to a brand best known for G-Shock design and smartlink features.

item.title: 2 Innovations For Financial Markets
item.description: These plans showcase how we can apply the power of LLMs to financial markets, and financial literacy.

item.title: TV’s Best New Show Is Now #1 On Rotten Tomatoes
item.description: Rotten Tomatoes has listed its most popular shows of the week, and the best show on TV and its 95% score are on top.
